action.action-desc: Mr. Duffy (for himself, Mr. Connolly, Mr. Gohmert, Ms. Norton, Mr. Meadows, Ms. Sinema, Mr. Cole, Mr. Costa, and Mr. Grothman) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
Additional sponsors: Mr. Farenthold, Mr. Delaney, and Mr. Perlmutter
Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed

form.official-title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to extend certain protections against prohibited personnel practices, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Follow the Rules Act.

section.header: Prohibited personnel action based on ordering individual to violate rule or regulation

subsection.text: Subparagraph (D) of section 2302(b)(9) of title 5, United States Code, is amended by inserting , rule, or regulation after law.
Such subparagraph is further amended by striking for.

endorsement.action-desc: Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed
